name: Postiz
tagline: AI Agents and MCP to schedule social posts to 20+ channels
description: Postiz agent is here! The biggest social media AI agent to schedule your post to 20+ social channels, also with MCP. Connect your MCP to anything: ChatGPT / Claude / Cursor / n8n Your own private app!

name: Superinbox
tagline: Email vibing in your Gmail / Outlook
description: SuperInbox unlocks email vibing for everyone. AI learns your writing style and drafts perfect email replies + auto-organizes your Gmail/Outlook inbox. No new app needed. Busy professionals save 2+ hours daily handling their emails effortlessly.

name: Perplexity Patents
tagline: AI-powered patent search for everyone
description: Perplexity Patents is a new AI agent that makes IP intelligence accessible. Use natural language to search patents, academic papers, and code repositories. It understands complex queries, finds prior art, and provides cited answers, just like the core Perplexity experience.

name: ScaryStories Live
tagline: AI generated story worlds that unfold in real time
description: Experience storytelling like never before. ScaryStories Live transforms your ideas into live, AI-generated story scenes that evolve as you direct them. Perfect for creators, streamers, or anyone exploring the future of interactive storytelling.

name: Canvaâ€™s Creative Operating System
tagline: Visual Suite to edit vids, emails, sites + docs in a canvas
description: Our biggest product launch to date, the Creative Operating System, brings together a supercharged Visual Suite, world-first design AI, plus powerful ways to grow your business and scale your brand.

name: Affinity by Canva
tagline: Free creative software for vector, pixel, and print.=
description: All the design and photo editing tools you need in one app â€“ for free. Download Affinity now on macOS or Windows.

name: Tweek
tagline: Minimal weekly planner
description: Super simple planner without the fuss. Tweek feels as natural as pen and paper.

name: Skyvern
tagline: Automate anything in the browser
description: Skyvern helps companies automate browser-based workflows using LLMs and Computer Vision, replacing manual work with AI-generated and maintained scripts We just gave Skyvern the ability to write and maintain its own code, making it 2.7x cheaper and 2.3x faster than before. Give it a prompt (or a series of prompts), and the AI will generate and maintain playwright code while it runs. Try out the via Open Source or Cloud

name: Is it down?
tagline: Monitor your apis and websites on menubar
description: Is your website, API, or online service down? Hope not. But in case, get instant answers right in your macOS menubar with "Is It Down?"

name: Espresso v25.10
tagline: The web editor for Mac with next-gen intelligence
description: This release is _big._ It brings next-generation intelligence to Espresso and a serious boost to editing power â€” while staying true to what makes Espresso fast, elegant, and genuinely Mac-native.

name: Blur It
tagline: Blur Sensitive Info for Demos & Sharing
description: Instantly blur sensitive data on any page. Perfect for screen sharing, demos, and tutorials. Hide text, images, or draw blur boxes. Ever share your screen in a meeting and accidentally show sensitive client information? Or waste time creating "anonymized" screenshots for a demo? Stop worrying about data leaks or fumbling with developer tools. Blur It is the simple, reliable, and easy-to-use extension for professionals, agencies, and creators who need to hide information fast.

name: LunaRoute
tagline: High-perf, secure local proxy for AI coding assistants
description: LunaRoute is a high-performance secure local proxy for AI coding assistants like Claude Code, Codex, and OpenCode. Get complete visibility into every LLM interaction with zero-overhead passthrough, session recording, and powerful debugging capabilities

name: OpenFolder
tagline: Open any folder on macOS instantly
description: I built OpenFolder to make one simple thing fast â€” opening folders I use every day. It lives quietly in your macOS menu bar and gives you quick access to the places you actually work in â€” without digging through Finder or cluttering your Dock.

name: Usage4Claude
tagline: Monitor Your Claude AI Usage Right from Your Mac Menu Bar
description: An elegant macOS menu bar app for real-time monitoring of your Claude AI usage. âœ¨ Monitors all Claude platforms: Web â€¢ Claude Code â€¢ Desktop â€¢ Mobile App âœ¨

name: Halloween AI Photo Booth
tagline: Hop in the booth and dress up with AI to show your costume
description: Itâ€™s Framerâ€™s virtual Halloween Office Bash! Dress up, hop in the booth, and strike your scariest (or funniest) pose. Prizes await the best costumes!

name: FormAI
tagline: AI Gymbro that fixes your form, and plans your next move.
description: AI gym bro with eyes. Sees what machine you're using, roasts your form (nicely), prevents injuries, and plans your whole session. Real-time corrections + next exercise recommendations. Like having a coach who actually watches you.

name: QuickMarketFit
tagline: Turn Online Conversations Into Customers.
description: Find conversations on Reddit, X, and LinkedIn where people need what you offer. Reply naturally, in a way that fits the flow of the conversation.

name: Reliable Agents
tagline: Free go-to resource for all things AI agents automation
description: Launching Reliable Agents with the "State of Agentic Browser/Computer Use - 2025" report! Check out the market map and tips on how to navigate it ðŸ‘€

name: Pen Island: Clean Drawings
tagline: Public art site protected by really really advanced AI
description: Clean drawings, clean mind. A public art site protected by really really advanced computer vision trained to block unwanted content. We are incredibly passionate about sharing art on the internet. But the internet is full of trolls. So we used the latest models to block their childish humor and immature attempts at art. Now, we have a pristine website with only clean art, drawn by humans with soul, spirit, and creativity. A safe and flourishing Pen Island. All we need is you!

name: Sisypho
tagline: Record UI action. Replay like RPA. Or Tool-ify for your CUA.
description: Weâ€™re two engineers who kept hitting the same wall with UI automations. RPA tools were too rigid, and CUAs broke on the smallest layout change. So we built Sisypho â€” an open-source way to record what you do, replay it reliably, and turn it into tools your agent can call. Create RPA-style automations in plain English and give your CUA trusted, deterministic actions instead of fragile clicks. Please note this is currently supported on MacOS only.
